Qualcomm MSM8928平台简介

Process Tech. 28nm
Package 12×12 PoP
Processor Quad Cortex A7 1.4-1.6GHz 1 MB - L2 ADSP QDSP6V5 – 500MHz + 128KL2 mDSP 2xQDSP6V5- 500MHz + 128KL2
MODEM 1X Advanced 1xEV-DO Rev. 0/A/B
DC-HSPA + TD-SCDMA
GSM/GPRS/EDGE
Rel 10 LTE CA - Cat4
CnE (WiFi offload)
NSRM (signaling optimizations)
Peak Data Rates UL/DL DC-HSPA+: DL 42 Mbps / UL 11 Mbps
DO: DL 14.7 Mbps / UL 5.4 Mbps
1x: DL / UL 307.2 kbps
LTE - FL/RL: 150 / 50 Mbps (Cat 4)
Modem Enhancements QQLIC, 4GV (EVRC-B, EVRC-WB), EVRC-NW, Equalizer with Rx Diversity (Type 3i), DARP ph1, Integrated DSDS and DSDA
Frequency Support LTE: B1/2/4/5/13/17/7/19/21/11/12/18/3/8/20
CDMA: BC0 BC10 BC1 BC14 BC4 BC6 BC15
UMTS: B1 B2 B3 B4 B5 B6 B8
TDSCDMA: B34 / B39 / B40
GSM: Quad Band
RF+PMIC Chipset WTR1605L/1625L/2605 + PM8926+WCD9302/06 Quickcharge 2.0
Memory 1 x 600 MHz LPDDR3
LCD Support 16/18/24-bit FHD (1920×1080) at 45-60 fps
Bluetooth WCN3620
WLAN 802.11b/g/n WCN3620
USB USB 2.0 All Speed Peripheral or Host
Graphics Adreno 305 450MHz
Video Decode 30fps 1080p (MPEG-4 / H.264 / VC-1 / WMV-9 / DivX 4/5/6)
H.265 (HEVC): 720p at 30fps
Video Encode 30fps 1080p (H.264/MPEG-4)
Qcamera Single ISP
Rear: 13M Pixel
Front: 5M Pixel
Audio 5.1 Surround Playback & Camcorder
Low Power Audio Core
DSP Post-Proc programmability Enhanced Echo Cancellation FLUENCE Pro (Noise cancellation)
GPS/GNSS Gen 8B with Glonass/Beidou Standalone Assisted XTRA 3dB sens. imprv. vs. Gen 7
Security and DRM Secure boot, Secure debug, Crypto hardware, TrustZone, Qualcomm secure execution environment, Widevine Level 1, PlayReady, HDCP 2 Tx
Proximity P2P Networking AllJoy
